DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to develop a mathematical algorithm which the investigators plan to use to more accurately estimate intraoperative blood loss.
DOC.brief_title: Method for Improved Intraoperative Blood Loss Estimates
DOC.criteria: All elective surgical patients 1. Age < 18 2. Pregnant women 3. Prisoners 4. Lack of informed consent 5. Attending Physician feels enrollment could interfere with optimal patient care 6. Patients who did not have a preoperative hemoglobin measured as part of their preoperative workup 7. Patients whose preoperative hemoglobin fraction is abnormal. 8. Patients who will likely require an intraoperative blood transfusion. 9. Patients for whom the intraoperative use of the Cell Saver is anticipated.
